p: Species of Citrus fruits, such as C. hystrix [ 22], C. australasica [ 23], C. junos, C. limon and C. aurantifolia [ 24], and the Citrus-like Eustis limequat fruit [ 25] were analysed by MDGC and GCÃ—GC techniques which proved to be efficient tools to differentiate odorants, varieties and origins, as well as reliably separate, identify and quantify their chiral compounds.
